example.text: Joe Biden has violated his oath to defend our border and uphold our immigration laws. He has led our great nation into a drastic decline by putting AMERICA LAST. [[url]]

From the moment Joe Biden implemented this detrimental mandate, which devastated military recruitment and morale, I promised the service members in my district that I would fight for a full repeal and oppose the Defense Authorization bill until it ended the COVID vaccine mandate. Many argued that Congress did not have the power to end the COVID vaccine mandate through the NDAA, but I held firm, and now, we are vindicated.
Joe Biden has violated his oath to defend our border and uphold our immigration laws. He has led our great nation into a drastic decline by putting AMERICA LAST. [[url]]
Joe Biden has violated his oath to defend our border and uphold our immigration laws. He has led our great nation into a drastic decline by putting AMERICA LAST. [[url]]

As a farmer, I know that foreign land purchases are especially an issue in rural America where the Chinese Communist Party is attempting to buy land in our country to gain strategic leverage over the United States and our food supply. Our adversaries continue to rob our country of wealth and prosperity under Joe Biden's weak leadership and it's time for Congress to act.

You can view segments from my interview below. STANDING UP FOR RELIGIOUS FREEDOM Last week, Congressional Democrats voted to advance legislation that would further weaponize the federal government against conservatives by opening the door for anyone to sue faith-based institutions.
